Class Persistence.UriUsage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.Persistence.UriUsage

    protected static final class Persistence.UriUsage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Persistence.UriUsage>
    Defined in order to count how many times an URI has been consumed.
